content: the coodie hooded cowl with turtleneck face covering is easy to adjust to any size i have updated this croche tpattern as of 10th jan 2026 and included 2 seperate pdfs for the original hooded cowl and now including another pdf with the toddler to adult sizing the reson for this is some people preferred the easy original no fuss hooded cowl pattern - so i kept both i used 600g 2 and a half 400g balls of king cole double knit held together
